name: Ashen Mothers of the Stars
description: Hailing from the Osmerian Sea, the Ashen Mothers of the Stars are known for their skill in shadow magic. Specifically moving from shadow and shadow, smuggling goods within the shadows of clueless civilians. Now working as diviners - those who navigate the dreams of others in order to heal mental afflictions, they look towards the future with a glint in their eye. Their future is bright. The only question: what comes next?
